preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 10.0 g of Silver (Ag).  
 2. Measure out 20.0 g of Bismuth (Bi).  
 3. Measure out 1.0 g of Lithium (Li).  
 4. Measure out 40.0 g of Rubidium (Rb).  
 5. Combine all powders into a clean, dry mixing container.  
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders for about 10 minutes until a uniform mixture is obtained.
